title: Did a Catholic priest refuse to give Joe Biden a share?
subtitle: The Reverend. Robert Murray raised a debate in October 2019 when he said he denied the monstrosity to Paden because he called for an abortion.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In October 2019, the Reverend. Robert Murray of the parish of St. Anthony in Florence, South Carolina, former Vice-President Joe Biden rejected the ritual of Catholic participation.
